about_the_game:
"Natures Ascendancy" is an immersive open-world survival game set on a mysterious alien planet teeming with ancient secrets and dangers. Players take on the role of Aya, a resourceful explorer stranded on the planet after her spacecraft crashes. As Aya navigates the lush and diverse environments, she must gather resources, craft tools and equipment, and uncover the truth behind the planet's enigmatic past.

With stunning visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, players will embark on a journey filled with breathtaking landscapes, dynamic weather systems, and vibrant ecosystems. From dense jungles to towering mountains and underwater caverns, every corner of the planet holds unique challenges and discoveries.

Survival in "Natures Ascendancy" goes beyond basic needs like food and water. Players must adapt to the planet's ever-changing conditions, including dangerous wildlife, hostile weather patterns, and mysterious anomalies. Along the way, Aya will encounter remnants of an ancient alien civilization, each with its own story to tell and secrets to unlock.

As players explore, they'll unravel the mysteries of the planet's past and its connection to Aya's own destiny. Through exploration, puzzle-solving, and interaction with the environment, Aya will uncover fragments of lore and piece together the truth behind her crash landing and the secrets hidden within the planet's core.

With its rich storytelling, immersive gameplay mechanics, and stunning visuals, "Natures Ascendancy" offers players an unforgettable adventure as they strive to survive, thrive, and uncover the secrets of an alien world.

detailed_description:
"Natures Ascendancy" is an immersive open-world survival game set on a mysterious alien planet teeming with ancient secrets and dangers. Players take on the role of Aya, a resourceful explorer stranded on the planet after her spacecraft crashes. As Aya navigates the lush and diverse environments, she must gather resources, craft tools and equipment, and uncover the truth behind the planet's enigmatic past.

With stunning visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, players will embark on a journey filled with breathtaking landscapes, dynamic weather systems, and vibrant ecosystems. From dense jungles to towering mountains and underwater caverns, every corner of the planet holds unique challenges and discoveries.

Survival in "Natures Ascendancy" goes beyond basic needs like food and water. Players must adapt to the planet's ever-changing conditions, including dangerous wildlife, hostile weather patterns, and mysterious anomalies. Along the way, Aya will encounter remnants of an ancient alien civilization, each with its own story to tell and secrets to unlock.

As players explore, they'll unravel the mysteries of the planet's past and its connection to Aya's own destiny. Through exploration, puzzle-solving, and interaction with the environment, Aya will uncover fragments of lore and piece together the truth behind her crash landing and the secrets hidden within the planet's core.

With its rich storytelling, immersive gameplay mechanics, and stunning visuals, "Natures Ascendancy" offers players an unforgettable adventure as they strive to survive, thrive, and uncover the secrets of an alien world.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Kernel 5+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 2300/ AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2050/ AMD/ Intel equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Kernel 5+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12400/ AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060ti/ AMD/ Intel equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: NaturesAscendancy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 2300/ AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2050/ AMD/ Intel equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12400/ AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060ti/ AMD/ Intel equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Natures Ascendancy" is an exhilarating open-world survival game where players explore a mysterious alien planet, uncover ancient secrets, and survive its treacherous environments. With stunning visuals and immersive gameplay mechanics, embark on an unforgettable journey of discovery and survival.
